mapper.select: SELECT b.`id`,b.`name` FROM sys_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_role AS b ON a.`user_role` = b.`id` WHERE a.`user_login` = #{name}
SELECT a.`id`,a.`url` FROM sys_permission AS a LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission_ref AS b ON a.`id` = b.`per_id` WHERE b.`role_id` = #{id}
SELECT user_name,user_login,user_pass,locked FROM sys_user WHERE user_login = #{login}
